coreAttributes.name: knuckle duster
coreAttributes.description: A piece of metal shaped to fit around someone's fist. The outer rim, which is the part that impacts the wielder's target, has been imbued with an arcane enchantment.
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(fit)] [npc.her] knuckle dusters onto [npc.her] fist, so that they're ready to use in combat.
coreAttributes.unequipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(take)] off [npc.her] knuckle dusters, before putting them away.

hitDescriptions.hitText: Swinging [npc.her] knuckle-duster-clad fist, [npc.name] [npc.verb(manage)] to land a solid punch on [npc2.namePos] [npc2.arm].
Striking out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] knuckle dusters, [npc.name] [npc.verb(manage)] to land a solid hit on [npc2.her] [npc2.arm]!
With a quick step forwards, [npc.name] [npc.verb(jab)] out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] fist, whacking [npc.her] knuckle dusters against [npc2.her] shoulder!

missDescriptions.missText: Swinging [npc.her] knuckle-duster-clad fist, [npc.name] [npc.verb(attempt)] to punch [npc2.name] on the [npc2.arm], but [npc.verb(end)] up missing [npc2.herHim]!
Striking out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] knuckle dusters, [npc.name] [npc.verb(let)] out a frustrated cry as [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
With a quick step forwards, [npc.name] [npc.verb(jab)] out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] fist, but [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
